channel.title: Delete on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Delete on Metricly Docs

item.title: Delete a Policy
item.description: On the Alerts page, select the desired policy. In Policy Editor, click Delete.

item.title: Enable or Disable a Policy
item.description: On the Alerts page, select the desired policy. In Policy Editor, select or deselect the Enable Policy checkbox. You can also enable or disable policies directly from the List and Card Policy view options.
